title: Cancer Patients England Become
summary: England has become the first European country to offer an injectable form of the immunotherapy drug nivolumab Opdivo for cancer patients. Approved by the MHRA, the quick, under-the-skin injection can treat up to 15 types of cancer and reduces treatme

sample_posts.text: England has become the first European country to offer an injectable form of the immunotherapy drug nivolumab (Opdivo) for cancer patients. Approved by the MHRA, the quick, under-the-skin injection can treat up to 15 types of cancer and reduces treatment time from about an hour to just five minutes,

Dear Friends: Today I had my 4th of 12 monthly immunotherapy infusion treatments of a medicine called OPDIVO. This treatment is for melanoma cancer that was diagnosed in May. I am happy to say that I have NOT had any side effects from the treatments. I am happy to say I HAVE had: An mri A pet scan 2
